topic.title: Local machine inventory
topic.shortdesc: How to do a local machine inventory

body.p: You can generate a local inventory of a machine in XML or HTML/
on Windows, you must first go in the directory where the agent is installed and then in the perl/bin subdirectory: perl fusioninventory-agent --local c:/tmp
on an UNIX systeme : fusioninventory-agent --local c:/tmp
To do a HTML inventory, you've just to add the --html parameter: fusioninventory-agent --local c:/tmp --html
